installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

apt update

apt -y install git

git clone https://gitlab.com/ourworkzone/ptrodactyle-apache2-php8.1 ./temp

cp -r ./temp/apache2 /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/

chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

rm -rf ./temp

cd /mnt/server/webroot/
rm -rf ./temp
